# peripheral Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    peripheral = {
      source  = "peripheral-cloud/peripheral"
      version = "0.1.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "peripheral" {
  # example configuration here
}
```
